original_text: And Pharaoh sent, and behold, not one of the livestock of Israel was dead. But the heart of Pharaoh was hardened, and he did not let the people go.
korean_text: 바로가 사람을 보내어 본즉 이스라엘의 가축은 하나도 죽지 아니하였더라 그러나 바로의 마음이 완강하여 백성을 보내지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: not one of the livestock of Israel was dead.
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘의 가축 중 하나도 죽지 아니하였더라.

sentences.original_text: But the heart of Pharaoh was hardened,
and he did not let the people go.
